casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Brian Keith BLACKWELL No. 197P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Brian Keith Blackwell, for Blackwell, Brian Keith Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 16th of June 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of June 2017 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of June 2017 by Defendant to Amend Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of August 2017 by Defendant to Dismiss:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."

Ervin, J. recused
